page.title: 17OCCUPATIONS IN LOSCOE
page.content: Loscoe offers many different types of work. The opencast which covers a large amount of area employs quite a few workers. Although this is good as regards occupations it affects living conditions and wild life suffers. There are several factories in the Loscoe area including a brick factory. This is unhealthy because of the dust it deposits. Rydes butcher factory employs many people who deliver around the country and actually prepare the meat. The refuse tip does not offer a lot of jobs but it is always in use. The village has quite a few shops an three pubs which gives local people a form of employment. Loscoe is an area that offers few jobs for the people in the area, and most have to travel further afield for work, though the local development plan offers some hope for the future.
